title: the icon "exile:player" showing the wrong content of cards.

comments.body:
The order of the icons was changed but unfortunately I missed ordering the associated tabs as well so that the functionality remains as before - 

player hand
player graveyard
computer graveyard
player exile
computer exile
computer hand

I have published a fix which assigns the correct view to the new icon order and which should be included in the next daily snapshot build.

**Status:** Started
